mapper.select: SELECT /* NotificationMapper.findNotificationsByUserNo */ NOTIFY_ID, USER_NO, MESSAGE, TYPE, SHOW_YN FROM notifications WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND show_yn = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT /* NotificationMapper.insertNotification */ INTO notifications (user_no, message, type, system_register_id, system_updater_id) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{message}, #{type}, #{userNo}, #{userNo})
